scripts.clean: rm -rf dist src/webcomponent/index.js index.html core.html vanilla.html jquery.html webcomponent.html
scripts.copy: npm run mkdirs && (npm run copy:html & npm run copy:css & npm run copy:examples & npm run preprocess:js & wait)
scripts.copy:examples: preprocess examples/index.html -o index.html & preprocess examples/core.html -o core.html & preprocess examples/vanilla.html -o vanilla.html & preprocess examples/jquery.html -o jquery.html & preprocess examples/webcomponent.html -o webcomponent.html
scripts.copy:html:template: preprocess src/webcomponent/template-v0.html --src-dir src/webcomponent -o dist/webcomponent/template-v0.html & preprocess src/webcomponent/template-v1.html --src-dir src/webcomponent -o dist/webcomponent/template-v1.html & wait
scripts.copy:html: npm run copy:html:template & npm run copy:html:index
scripts.build: npm run copy && (npm run build:core & npm run build:vanilla & npm run build:jquery & npm run build:webcomponent & npm run build:webcomponent2 & wait)
scripts.build:jquery: browserify src/jquery/index.js -g babelify -s $npm_package_name.jquery -x jquery | uglifyjs -c -o dist/jquery/index.js
scripts.watch: npm run copy && (npm run watch:files & npm run watch:core & npm run watch:vanilla & npm run watch:jquery & npm run watch:webcomponent & npm run watch:webcomponent2)
scripts.watch:files: onchange 'src/**/*.html' -- npm run copy:html & onchange 'src/**/*.css' -- npm run copy:css & onchange 'src/**/*.pre.js' -- npm run preprocess:js & onchange 'examples/**/*' -- npm run copy:examples
scripts.dev: npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build
